WorkItem.ClosedComment: Should be fixed for next release.
WorkItem.Description:
Recently, like one or two weeks now, I'm having trouble using the optimizer. I cannot get it to finish an optimization, because it crashes at random percentages during the process. The optimizer popup window simply freezes. If I click the cancel button it usually gives me another popup with the suggested gearset at that point of the optimization process. I can tell, because it's different between tries. I am usually not able to close the window. It just does nothing when I click close or the cross.
Â 
I'm using firefox, but the problem also occurs in internet explorer and in the downloadable version of RAWR.
I'm using the current version of RAWR which is 4.2.4.
I'm using a Windows 7 64-bit machine with an Intel i7 and 6 GB of memory.
